friendLines.title: Hello
friendLines.description:
I'm Alhaitham, the Akademiya's scribe. If you wish to access an archived file, please submit an application according to the prescribed format.
Oh, your form isn't ready? Not to worry. You can come again on the next working day. My work hours are posted outside the office.

friendLines.title: Chat: Work
friendLines.description: The scribe's work is simple, which is exactly why I took the position.

friendLines.title: Chat: Reading
friendLines.description: Book learning alone is not enough to cultivate intelligence. All those scholars in the Akademiya are prime examples.

friendLines.title: Chat: Thinking
friendLines.description: Hmm, there have been many poorly written applications lately. I guess I'll just have to reject them all.

friendLines.title: When It Rains
friendLines.description: Going out on a rainy day is the worst.

friendLines.title: When Thunder Strikes
friendLines.description: It's just a natural phenomenon, so there's nothing to be afraid of... unless you're beneath a tree.

friendLines.title: When It Snows
friendLines.description: It's getting cold, you say? I feel fine.

friendLines.title: When the Sun Is Out
friendLines.description: This weather is perfect for doing nothing at all.

friendLines.title: In the Desert
friendLines.description: Curses, there's sand in my shoes.

friendLines.title: Good Morning
friendLines.description: It's a little early for me... Let me get a cup of coffee first.

friendLines.title: Good Afternoon
friendLines.description: If there's nothing to do, then I'll just put on my soundproof earpieces and nap for a while.

friendLines.title: Good Evening
friendLines.description: I'll be taking some time for myself now. Goodbye.

friendLines.title: Good Night
friendLines.description: I hope my roommate won't be hammering away on another one of his projects in the dead of night... Actually, I'd prefer if he wasn't home at all. I really don't want to wear my soundproof earpieces to bed.

friendLines.title: About Alhaitham: Facts
friendLines.description: Rather than lacing my words with rhetoric, I prefer speaking factually.

friendLines.title: About Alhaitham: Rumors
friendLines.description:
Oh? You're concerned about all the rumors you've heard about me?
Don't bother, because I don't care whether you believe those rumors. Just don't throw extra trouble my way, and we'll be fine.

friendLines.title: About Us: Greetings
friendLines.description: Don't be offended if you try to greet me on the street and I don't respond. It's simply because I'm wearing my soundproof earpieces, that's all.

friendLines.title: About Us: Helping Each Other
friendLines.description: It seems you're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself, so much so that you even look after that little companion of yours. I don't have any suggestions to offer you, and frankly, you probably don't need my help.

friendLines.title: About the Vision
friendLines.description: To be completely honest, this Dendro Vision isn't of much help to my research... However, there's no denying the effectiveness of elemental powers when settling a physical dispute, so it still proves useful at times.

friendLines.title: Something to Share
friendLines.description: Truth serves no master. Humankind is not a vehicle for knowledge, nor is knowledge the aim of humankind.

friendLines.title: Interesting Things
friendLines.description: There are many things in this world that may catch our eye, but don't always believe what you see. If what we see in the world were all there was to it, then there'd be no need to think, would there?

friendLines.title: About Lesser Lord Kusanali
friendLines.description: One should neither dismiss nor overly revere the divine. Gods require followers, and they are also part of a biological hierarchy. That's why I don't take any pride in the fact that I helped rescue a god. I hope Lesser Lord Kusanali doesn't take offense.

unlockConditions.unlockText: Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

friendLines.title: About Kaveh: Overly Sensitive
friendLines.description: Kaveh tends to be overly sensitive about everyone and everything he crosses paths with, and he's constantly making a fuss about nothing. Maybe it's because he's too emotionally fragile...

friendLines.title: About Kaveh: Getting Duped
friendLines.description:
Someone set up a stand on the street saying that for each handmade keychain they sold, a child in poverty would be given a meal. Kaveh bought at least a dozen.
...This is Sumeru, where even healthcare is free. I needn't say more.

friendLines.title: About Tighnari
friendLines.description: Apparently, a lot of people think he has a bad temperament, but I don't think they're giving him a fair chance. When Kaveh built a house right over a Withering Zone and created a huge mess, it ended up being a real headache for the Forest Rangers. Even so, this Forest Ranger didn't hold it against Kaveh. He even invited Kaveh to his house for a meal. Hmm, maybe it's good people like him who allow people like Kaveh to survive.

friendLines.title: About Dori
friendLines.description: She's sharp and always keeps an eye out for herself. She knows how to take life by the reins and make her dreams a reality. I'm not condoning her actions, but just because we stand on different sides doesn't mean that I can't appreciate her attitude towards life.

friendLines.title: About Cyno
friendLines.description: The hivemind case certainly added to the matra's workload, but my conscience is clear. The root cause of what ultimately transpired actually has nothing to do with me at all. I'm sure Cyno appreciates that, as he hasn't once approached me about the incident.

friendLines.title: About Nilou
friendLines.description: The strengths and weaknesses of a performing artist are quite clear. Nilou knows how to play to her strengths, which enables her to live a happy and simple life.

unlockConditions.unlockText: Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

friendLines.title: About Dehya
friendLines.description: It's a waste for such a capable person to remain among the Eremites. If only she'd consider my suggestion to join the Akademiya... Our work would become a lot easier with someone like her around, but a predictable life isn't exactly her cup of tea — I can understand that. *sigh* What a pity.

unlockConditions.unlockText: Complete "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises"

friendLines.title: More About Alhaitham: I
friendLines.description: Most people are wary of interacting with me. Perhaps they're afraid, or maybe they think I'm difficult to get along with. I hope to keep things this way.

friendLines.title: More About Alhaitham: II
friendLines.description: I've never been interested in social interactions, and as you can see, my life is more comfortable than most. I'd say this is proof enough that being social is not one of life's necessities.

friendLines.title: More About Alhaitham: III
friendLines.description: Every person should have something that they believe in and hold on to from beginning to end. Otherwise, it's easy to succumb to the vicissitudes of life and find yourself being led astray.

friendLines.title: More About Alhaitham: IV
friendLines.description: Once order is disrupted, the consequences spread like wildfire. I'd like to avoid such a scenario, so I can keep my life intact and uninterrupted.

friendLines.title: More About Alhaitham: V
friendLines.description:
I'll occasionally go to the tavern for a drink after work.
That's not what you needed to know about? Huh, I was under the impression that sharing what you do in your free time is more personal than telling someone your thoughts or opinions. After all, you can get those from anybody on the Message Board.

friendLines.title: Alhaitham's Hobbies
friendLines.description:
I like reading difficult and abstruse books, and seeing others scratch their heads in confusion.
I'm only joking. I don't delight in others' misery, and rarely do I encounter a book that's difficult for me.

friendLines.title: Alhaitham's Troubles
friendLines.description: Based on my observations, many people inflict trouble upon themselves. Life already has enough hardships — no need to add to them.

friendLines.title: Favorite Food
friendLines.description: Taste supersedes presentation, else you risk overcomplicating the purpose of food. I think this is simple enough to understand.

friendLines.title: Least Favorite Food
friendLines.description: It's difficult to eat soup-like dishes while reading.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: I
friendLines.description: Mmm, I can taste your mastery of the seasonings.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: II
friendLines.description: Hmm, a contemporary flavor. Not bad.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: III
friendLines.description: Let's not eat here. Mind if I... take it home?

friendLines.title: Birthday
friendLines.description: Happy birthday. I've always thought people are a little too enthusiastic about celebrating the day they were born. Wouldn't it be better to apply all that enthusiasm towards their daily lives and improve their standards of living? But you seem to have done well for yourself. I didn't know what kind of gift to get, so I'll just set up a special application channel, reserved for your submissions alone.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
friendLines.description: Thank you.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
friendLines.description: Ah, so it wasn't a one-time-only thing.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
friendLines.description: I think you're more excited than me about this progress.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
friendLines.description: We mustn't let those lazy Akademiya scholars know about the progress I'm making. If they catch wind of this, they'll stop at nothing to make my life even more of a hassle. I'll reject anything they send my way, of course, but the communication required to do so is a huge waste of my time.

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
actionLines.description: Don't let any of it roll away now.

actionLines.title: Joining Party: III
actionLines.description: How long will this require, exactly?
